email_chain.subject: Spot Voyage - Wheat Ningde Anch to Port Harcourt - Initial Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Joel,

Hope you are well.

We have a firm offer for your consideration:

Commodity: Wheat
Load Port: Ningde Anch
Discharge Port: Port Harcourt
Cargo Size: 3543MT
Incoterm: CFR

Vessel: MAERSK ESSEN

Freight indication: AUD32/MT, CFR basis, Port Harcourt.

Owners keen to fix prompt. Laycan flexible, please advise your target window. Demurrage rate USD 15,000 per day pro rata.

Please advise if of interest. 

Best regards,

Amber Payne
Global Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Voyage - Wheat Ningde Anch to Port Harcourt - Initial Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Amber,

Thanks for the offer.

AUD32 looks a bit high for the current market. Can you check if owners might be willing to come down a bit? Our target laycan is 10-15 August.

Also, can you confirm the MAERSK ESSEN's grain capacity and LOA? 

Regards,

Joel Daniel
CharterCo

email_chain.subject: Re: Spot Voyage - Wheat Ningde Anch to Port Harcourt - Initial Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Joel,

Confirmed. Maersk Essen LOA 366m. Grain capacity appx 3600MT. 

I've spoken with owners. They are holding firm on AUD32. They noted the current WLTOHC rate is driving prices up a bit.

Best regards,

Amber Payne
Global Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Lanshan/Enkhuizen - Soybeans - Spot Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Ana,

Ows following spot fixture for Soybeans:

Load Port: Lanshan Anch
Discharge Port: Enkhuizen
Cargo Size: 8792 MT
Commodity: Soybeans
Incoterm: DAP

Freight indication: €81/MT

Best regards,
Ismael Rose
Maritime Exchange Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Lanshan/Enkhuizen - Soybeans - Spot Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Ismael,

Thanks for the offer.

Can you confirm the vessel, and its DWT please?
Also, any idea on laycan dates?

Regarding rate. we are looking more at €78/mt. Any chance?

Best,
Ana Lara

email_chain.subject: Re: Lanshan/Enkhuizen - Soybeans - Spot Offer
email_chain.body:
Ana,

Vessel is mv MINERAL YANGFAN (DWT 206392). Laycan 25-29 April. 

Will check on EUR 78.00. Will revert shortly..

Regards,
Ismael

email_chain.subject: Re: Lanshan/Enkhuizen - Soybeans - Spot Offer
email_chain.body:
Ana,

Broker can accept eur 79.5/mt basis daps Enkhuizen. Owners very firm.

Rgds.
Ismael

email_chain.subject: Re: Lanshan/Enkhuizen - Soybeans - Spot Offer
email_chain.body:
Ismael.

Okay. EUR 79.5 it is. Can you send recap with all details including demurrage rate /day? 

Thanks,
Ana

email_chain.subject: RE: Lanshan/Enkhuizen - Soybeans - Spot Offer - Recap
email_chain.body:
Dear Ana,

As agreed, recap below:

Vessel: MINERAL YANGFAN
Commodity: Soybeans
Load Port: Lanshan Anch
Discharge Port: Enkhuizen
Cargo Size: 8792 MT
Incoterm: DAP
Laycan: 25-29 April
Freight: EUR 79.5/MT
Demurrage: EUR 25000/day.

Please confirm asap, ows.

Best regards,
Ismael Rose
Maritime Exchange Ltd. 

(Disclaimer: This email is for information only. Subject to details and recap.)

email_chain.subject: Iron Ore - Liverpool/Jiangyin Anch
email_chain.body:
Dear Cecilia,

Plsd to offer firm for Iron Ore, Liverpool to Jiangyin Anch.

Cargo: 6438 MT, CFR.

Vessel: UMM AL ASHTAN

Freight indication: low 50s USD.

Best regards,
Steve Kennedy
Seaway Commercial Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Liverpool/Jiangyin Anch
email_chain.body:
Hi Steve,

Thanks for the offer. Could you please confirm the vessel's build year? We are a bit concerned about the age.

Cecilia Mason
Globex Shipping

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Liverpool/Jiangyin Anch
email_chain.body:
Cecilia,

Vessel built 2000. Can also offer MV Pacific Dawn, built 2010, same specs. Freight indication mid 50s usd. 

Regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Liverpool/Jiangyin Anch
email_chain.body:
Steve,

Thanks. Pacific Dawn looks better. What are the laycan dates and demurrage rate?

Cecilia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Liverpool/Jiangyin Anch
email_chain.body:
Cecilia,

Laycan: Aug 10-20. Demurrage $25,000/day.

Rgds,
SK

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Liverpool/Jiangyin Anch
email_chain.body:
Steve,

That's a bit high. Can you do $54/mt for Pacific Dawn?

Cecilia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore - Liverpool/Jiangyin Anch
email_chain.body:
Cecilia,

Agreed. $54/mt CFR Jiangyin Anch. Subjects stem approval.

Regards,
Steve

email_chain.subject: Palm Oil Freight Inquiry - Chek Lap Kok to Recalada
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Orozco,

Following our telephone conversation, please find our initial freight indication for the carriage of approximately 919 MT of Palm Oil, FOB Chek Lap Kok to Recalada:

Basis:
Commodity: Palm Oil
Quantity: 919 MT
Loading Port: Chek Lap Kok
Discharge Port: Recalada
Incoterm: FOB
Vessel: spot vessel
Freight: EUR 102/MT

Please advise your interest. 

Best Regards,
Katie Romero
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Freight Inquiry - Chek Lap Kok to Recalada
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Romero,

Thank you for the prompt response. EUR 102/MT is a bit high for the current market. Can you sharpen your pencil? Also, can you confirm that the port of Recalada can accommodate a vessel of around 399m LOA and 190326 DWT?

Regards,
Matt Orozco

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Freight Inquiry - Chek Lap Kok to Recalada
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Orozco,

Thank you for your quick reply. We are checking with owners about vessel accommodations at Recalada. Please note that due to draft restrictions, discharge might require lightening or STS operations. I will revert shortly with confirmation.
Regarding the freight, we can offer EUR 99/MT, wltohc. That's our best level at this stage.

Best Regards,
Katie Romero
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Freight Inquiry - Chek Lap Kok to Recalada
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Romero,

EUR 99/MT is better. Can you confirm availability on the MAASTRICHT MAERSK? Also, please clarify laycan and demurrage rate per day.

Regards,
Matt Orozco

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Freight Inquiry - Chek Lap Kok to Recalada
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Orozco,

MAASTRICHT MAERSK can be fixed. Laycan is September 8-12. Demurrage rate is USD 18,500/day pro-rata. Recalada confirms restrictions. Discharge may require lighterage or STS operations. Please confirm acceptance.
Freight: EUR 99/MT, cp details to follow upon confirmation. 

Best Regards,
Katie Romero
Anderson Shipping Brokers

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Palm Oil Freight - Chek Lap Kok to Recalada - MAASTRICHT MAERSK
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Romero,

Confirmed. Please proceed with cp. Thank you.

Regards,
Matt Orozco

email_chain.subject: LNG Freight Quote - St Petersburg to Penglai
email_chain.body:
Colleagues,

Good morning, I hope all is well.

Please find attached a freight quote for LNG, St Petersburg to Penglai, DAP basis. Cargo size 7380MT.

Freight: EUR55.30/MT.

Best regards,

Enrique Aguilar
Oceanic Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Freight Quote - St Petersburg to Penglai
email_chain.body:
Enrique,

Thanks for the quick reply.

We are revising our incoterms to FOB St Petersburg. Can you update the quote accordingly, including any impact on laycan and demurrage? Also, could you clarify the vessel details?

Regards,
Kristen Meyer
Global Energy Corp.

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Freight Quote - St Petersburg to Penglai
email_chain.body:
Kristen,

Understood, FOB St Petersburg now.

Recap: LNG, 7380MT, St Petersburg (FOB) to Penglai. Laycan 15-25 March (dates subject to stem availability at loading port).

Vessel: DHT OPAL (DWT 320105 / LOA 333m) is ncb for your cargo.

Revised freight quote: EUR 52.80/MT. Demurrage: EUR 35000/day pro rata.

Let me know if this is go.

Regards,
Enrique Aguilar
Oceanic Trade Services
